body:
Hey Guys!

So for all you Gravity Falls fans, Alex Hirsch said on Twitter that Dipper's real name is:

Michael

Michael Pines and Mabel Pines

title: Dipper Pine's Real Name! (Not Me)

replies.body: No, he says it in the episode with the photo copier.
